high_descs: turn left, take a step, turn right, walk forward, turn right to face the desk
pick up the pen that is on the desk
take two steps to the left to face the lamp
anns.task_desc: examine a pen with the lamp

high_descs: take the red pen from the desk
turn around, take a step to the left, turn around
anns.task_desc: take the red pen from the desk, turn on the lamp

high_descs: Walk forward and face the desk.
Pick up the red pen from the desk.
Move to the left side of the desk.
anns.task_desc: Look at a pen by the lamp light.
